str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The south wind, the South. Of uncertain affinity; the south(-west) wind; by extension, the southern quarter itself.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To blow gently. From hupo and pneo; to breathe gently, i.e. Breeze.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, doko dok'-o of the same meaning; to think; by implication, to seem.
From kratos; to use strength, i.e. Seize or retain.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From protithemai; a setting forth, i.e. proposal; specially, the show-bread as exposed before God.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To coast along, sail along. From para and the middle voice of lego;, to lay one's course near, i.e. Sail past.
Nearer, close by. Neuter comparative of the base of eggus; more nearly, i.e. Very near.
Crete. Of uncertain derivation; Crete, an island in the Mediterranean.
